```css
// Property: allowsPictureInPictureMediaPlayback
// Description: A Boolean value indicating whether HTML5 videos can play picture-in-picture.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.iOS.WebViewConfiguration
'.allows-picture-in-media-playback': { allowsPictureInPictureMediaPlayback: true }
'.allows-picture-in-media-playback-false': { allowsPictureInPictureMediaPlayback: false }
```
